General.Name: Shanghai Sinyang Semiconductor
General.Description: Shanghai Sinyang Semiconductor Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, sale, and service of electronic materials and relevant surface treatment equipment in China. The company offers electroplating and deflashing chemical products; and high speed plating line, energy saving automatic plating line, automatic rack plating line, high pressure water jet, and automatic chemical immersion line equipment. It also provides ultra-pure wafer processing chemicals and wafer level wet process benches; and aerospace aircraft electronic chemical materials, such as electroless nickel chemical materials. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Shanghai, China.
